description: Jake Porter knows his step-brother is curious, which is why he's always parading around in front of Ryan Jordan naked. He knows the tease is tempting to his new family member, seeing as how their parents just married, but he had no idea the depths to which Ryan would sink to get his first whiff of cock until he finds Ryan underneath the bed clutching Jake's freshly discarded underwear. Jake smiles at Ryan's embarrassment and tells him to come out- from the closet AND from under the bed. He tells Ryan he can do a lot better than just sniffing his jock if he's curious, but Ryan has reservations about doing something like this with his step-brother. Family is supposed to be off limits, but Ryan's lust for his brother's cock might just prove too tempting to resist.Enjoy!
title: Step Sniffer
